title: Asian Markets Surge Amid U.S.-China Trade Truce and AI Investment Boom
description: Asian stock markets rose on Monday due to a trade truce between the U.S. and China along with increased investment in artificial intelligence. Despite optimism, doubts persist on whether the trade agreement will hold. Investors focus on economic developments, central bank actions, and upcoming earnings reports from tech firms.
content: Asian stocks experienced upward momentum on Monday, bolstered by a temporary trade truce between the U.S. and China and a surge in artificial intelligence investment. The dollar remained near a three-month high following assertive remarks from Federa... [611 chars]

title: Asian stocks rise on AI sentiment, dollar near 3-month high
description: SINGAPORE: Asian stocks rose on Monday as investors weighed last week's megacap earnings showing significant spending on artificial intelligence, while the dollar held near a three-month high after hawkish comments from Federal Reserve policymakers.
